page.title: 15CARRICKFERGUS INDUSTRY.
page.content: The Carrickfergus Industrial Centre is situated on the old Courtaulds site of approximately 300 acres. Its policy is to bring the empty buildings back into beneficial occupation for industrial storage and office business. It has huge warehouses, a massive electricity generating station; a complex water distribution system; effluent treatment plant and fire protection. There are over 50 tenants employing almost 400 people. The logical maximum for the site is about 1,000 in the present accommodation but there is more land available for building. Tenancies in 1985 include precision engineering, haulage, tropical fish trading warehousing, textiles, carpets, building supplies,metal recovery, computer services, sports gear,exporting/importing agency.
